name: CFWheels Template Example App
author: Tom King
shortDescription: A CFWheels 2.x example app with user management, role based permissions and password resets

scripts.postInstallAll: rm base/box.json --force && cp config/ base/config/ --recurse && cp controllers/ base/controllers/ --recurse && cp events/ base/events/ --recurse && cp global/ base/global/ --recurse && cp javascript/ base/javascript/ --recurse && cp migrator/ base/migrator/ --recurse && cp models/ base/models/ --recurse && cp plugins/ base/plugins/ --recurse && cp stylesheets/ base/stylesheets/ --recurse && cp tests/ base/tests/ --recurse && cp views/ base/views/ --recurse && cp base/ ./ --recurse && rm base/ --recurse --force && tokenreplace path=box.json token=base/plugins/ replacement=plugins/
